core_meaning.normalized_summary: This is danger you can’t ignore: a gorge, deep water, repeated entrapment. The only way through is inner honesty and disciplined conduct. Don’t thrash in panic or charge deeper into risk. Move only when aligned and clear, and you can still accomplish something meaningful inside the crisis.

lines.normalized_meaning: Every direction is hazardous. Movement itself multiplies the danger. Best move is not to move.

lines.normalized_meaning: In danger, keep it humble and sincere. Offer simple support and speak with care to those above you. Gentle, honest counsel avoids blame.

lines.normalized_meaning: The flood hasn’t overflowed. Structure is returning. The danger is being managed toward resolution, and you’re not at fault.
